description: Trail from KVR all the way to the summit of Little white  Goes through the forest on singletrack with some loam sections and long rock gardens. The top part of the trail is in the alpine and is mostly loose rock on a service road. There is a cement pad at the summit.5.8 km is to the end of the telegraph trail then you will be on a foresty road to the top of little white and another 3 km or so
directions: Parking for this trail is at Bellevue Trestle, with the trailhead and signage about 0.5km up the precarious dirt road to the left (south east). The dirt road is very well maintained and drivable in most cars. Watch for potholes, and a couple larger dips.
title: Telegraph
